chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params

Goal:
forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> lastApplied st' = lastApplied st

Premises:
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Inductive msg (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := RequestVote : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> msg | RequestVoteReply : term -> bool -> msg | AppendEntries : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> list entry -> logIndex -> msg | AppendEntriesReply : term -> list entry -> bool -> msg Arguments msg {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVote {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVoteReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%bool_scope Arguments AppendEntries {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _ _ _%list_scope Arguments AppendEntriesReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%list_scope _%bool_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
raft_data = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments raft_data {orig_base_params raft_params}
*** [ Core.ByteListReader.t : Type -> Type ] Arguments Core.ByteListReader.t _%type_scope
Notation lastApplied := (RaftState.lastApplied term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output)
logIndex = nat : Set
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
handleAppendEntries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (_ : name) (state : raft_data) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex) => if t <? currentTerm state then (state, AppendEntriesReply (currentTerm state) entries false) else if prevLogIndex =? 0 then if haveNewEntries state entries then ({[{[{[{[advanceCurrentTerm state t with log := entries]} with commitIndex := Init.Nat.max (commitIndex state) (Init.Nat.min leaderCommit (maxIndex entries))]} with type := Follower]} with
term = nat : Set
raft_net_invariant_append_entries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (d, m) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_append_entries {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
handleTimeout_lastApplied : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ps : list (name * msg)), handleTimeout h st = (out, st', ps) -> lastApplied st' = lastApplied st
handleAppendEntriesReply_same_lastApplied : forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (src : name) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (b : bool) (st' : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleAppendEntriesReply n st src t es b = (st', l) -> lastApplied st' = lastApplied st
handleRequestVote_same_lastApplied : forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat) (c : fin N) (li lt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (ms : msg), handleRequestVote n st t c li lt = (st', ms) -> lastApplied st' = lastApplied st
handleClientRequest_lastApplied : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ps : list (name * msg)), handleClientRequest h st client id c = (out, st', ps) -> lastApplied st' = lastApplied st
handleAppendEntriesReply_same_log : forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (src : name) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (b : bool) (st' : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleAppendEntriesReply n st src t es b = (st', l) -> log st' = log st
tryToBecomeLeader_same_lastApplied : forall (n : name) (st : raft_data) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), tryToBecomeLeader n st = (out, st', ms) -> lastApplied st' = lastApplied st
handleRequestVote_same_log : forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat) (c : fin N) (li lt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (ms : msg), handleRequestVote n st t c li lt = (st', ms) -> log st' = log st
msg_rec : forall P : msg -> Set, (forall (t : term) (n : name) (l : logIndex) (t0 : term), P (RequestVote t n l t0)) -> (forall (t : term) (b : bool), P (RequestVoteReply t b)) -> (forall (t : term) (n : name) (l : logIndex) (t0 : term) (l0 : list entry) (l1 : logIndex), P (AppendEntries t n l t0 l0 l1)) -> (forall (t : term) (l : list entry) (b : bool), P (AppendEntriesReply t l b)) -> forall m : msg, P m
msg_rect : forall P : msg -> Type, (forall (t : term) (n : name) (l : logIndex) (t0 : term), P (RequestVote t n l t0)) -> (forall (t : term) (b : bool), P (RequestVoteReply t b)) -> (forall (t : term) (n : name) (l : logIndex) (t0 : term) (l0 : list entry) (l1 : logIndex), P (AppendEntries t n l t0 l0 l1)) -> (forall (t : term) (l : list entry) (b : bool), P (AppendEntriesReply t l b)) -> forall m : msg, P m
msg_sind : forall P : msg -> SProp, (forall (t : term) (n : name) (l : logIndex) (t0 : term), P (RequestVote t n l t0)) -> (forall (t : term) (b : bool), P (RequestVoteReply t b)) -> (forall (t : term) (n : name) (l : logIndex) (t0 : term) (l0 : list entry) (l1 : logIndex), P (AppendEntries t n l t0 l0 l1)) -> (forall (t : term) (l : list entry) (b : bool), P (AppendEntriesReply t l b)) -> forall m : msg, P m
msg_ind : forall P : msg -> Prop, (forall (t : term) (n : name) (l : logIndex) (t0 : term), P (RequestVote t n l t0)) -> (forall (t : term) (b : bool), P (RequestVoteReply t b)) -> (forall (t : term) (n : name) (l : logIndex) (t0 : term) (l0 : list entry) (l1 : logIndex), P (AppendEntries t n l t0 l0 l1)) -> (forall (t : term) (l : list entry) (b : bool), P (AppendEntriesReply t l b)) -> forall m : msg, P m
handleRequestVoteReply_same_lastApplied : forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (src : name) (t : nat) (v : bool), lastApplied (handleRequestVoteReply n st src t v) = lastApplied st
tryToBecomeLeader_same_log : forall (n : name) (st : raft_data) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), tryToBecomeLeader n st = (out, st', ms) -> log st' = log st
doLeader_same_log : forall (st : raft_data) (n : name) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), doLeader st n = (os, st', ms) -> log st' = log st
handleRequestVoteReply_same_log : forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (src : name) (t : nat) (v : bool), log (handleRequestVoteReply n st src t v) = log st
doGenericServer = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (h : name) (state : raft_data) => let (out, state0) := applyEntries h state (rev (filter (fun x : entry => (lastApplied state <? eIndex x) && (eIndex x <=? commitIndex state)) (findGtIndex (log state) (lastApplied state)))) in (out, {[state0 with lastApplied := if lastApplied state0 <? commitIndex state0 then commitIndex state0 else lastApplied state0]}, []) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, name -> raft_data -> list raft_output * raft_data * list (name * msg) Arguments doGenericServer {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
advanceCurrentTerm_same_lastApplied : forall (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat), lastApplied (advanceCurrentTerm st t) = lastApplied st
raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (m : list (name * msg)) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (res : bool), handleAppendEntriesReply (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) (pSrc p) t es res = (d, m) -> pBody p = AppendEntriesReply t es res -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
applyEntries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix applyEntries (h : name) (st : raft_data) (entries : list entry) {struct entries} : list raft_output * raft_data := match entries with | [] => ([], st) | e :: es => let (out, st0) := cacheApplyEntry st e in let out0 := if name_eq_dec (eAt e) h then map (fun o : output => ClientResponse (eClient e) (eId e) o) out else [] in let (out', state) := applyEntries h st0 es in (out0 ++ out', state) end : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, name -> raft_data -> list entry -> list...
raft_net_invariant_do_leader = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), doLeader d h = (os, d', ms) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwState net h = d -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d' h') ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_do_leader {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
raft_net_invariant_timeout = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (h : name) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleTimeout h (nwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h') ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_timeout {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
haveQuorum = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (state : raft_data) (_ : name) (N : logIndex) => div2 (length nodes) <? length (filter (fun h : name => N <=? assoc_default name_eq_dec (matchIndex state) h 0) nodes) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), raft_data -> name -> logIndex -> bool Arguments haveQuorum {orig_base_params raft_params}
raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (h : name), doGenericServer h d = (os, d', ms) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwState net h = d -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d' h') ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
raft_net_invariant_client_request = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (h : name) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input), handleClientRequest h (nwState net h) client id c = (out, d, l) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h') ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_client_request {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (t : nat) (v : bool), handleRequestVoteReply (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) (pSrc p) t v = d -> pBody p = RequestVoteReply t v -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
raft_net_invariant_request_vote = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : nat) (cid : name) (lli llt : nat), handleRequestVote (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t (pSrc p) lli llt = (d, m) -> pBody p = RequestVote t cid lli llt -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_request_vote {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
RIR_handleInput : forall (net : network) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (ps' : list packet) (st' : name -> data), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> handleInput h inp (nwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h') -> (forall p' : packet, In p' ps' -> In p' (nwPackets net) \/ In p' (send_packets h l)) -> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
raft_invariant_handle_input : forall (P : network -> Prop) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> handleInput h inp (nwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h') -> (forall p' : packet, In p' ps' -> In p' (nwPackets net) \/ In p' (send_packets h l)) -> P {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
applied_entries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (sigma : name -> raft_data) => match argmax (fun h : name => lastApplied (sigma h)) (all_fin N) with | Some h => rev (removeAfterIndex (log (sigma h)) (lastApplied (sigma h))) | None => [] end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), (name -> raft_data) -> list entry Arguments applied_entries {orig_base_params raft_params} _%function_scope

```coq
```coq
intros h st t n pli plt es ci st' ps.
rewrite <- handleAppendEntries_spec with (orig_base_params := orig_base_params) (one_node_params := one_node_params) (raft_params := raft_params) (h := h) (state := st) (t := t) (leaderId := n) (prevLogIndex := pli) (prevLogTerm := plt) (entries := es) (leaderCommit := ci).
unfold handleAppendEntries.
rewrite <- RaftState.lastApplied_spec.
auto.
Qed.```
